title: What will be the 2020 presidential election “October surprise”? - Quora
tags: Political Campaigns in the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Original Question: What will be the 2020 presidential election “October surprise”? Michael, I don't know that we are going to get one, at least not from the candidates or their campaign staffs. With Vice President Joe Biden being the presumptive nominee so early in the process I think all the juicy bits of oppo reasearch will have been used up before we get to October, perhaps even by August. It is going to get nasty, very nasty, and President Trump is certainly a crude and highly aggressive campaigner that doesn't mind getting in the gutter. Both camps have teams or agencies doing all the oppo research imaginable. Just as every one did in 2016 and 2012, etc, etc. But, we have two well known candidates with plenty of public history. I'm confident there isn't very much new at all to blast President Trump with from his past. The Clintons are very effective campaigners, and things like the Steele Dossier are under construction on both sides, but it is hard to find new dirt on old dogs. The Clintons would have used everything they could find in October of 2016, and nothing worked, nothing stuck. The October surprise may very well be that one of the candidates simply keels over. Which will result in an insane mess to name and “certify" a new candidate, and then get them on the ballots nationwide. The two things I'm going to be watching this summer are, How well the Coronavirus economic recovery is goingHow well a second round of the virus is being managed or prepared forEconomically we are creating many problems right now on both sides of the aisle. Hell, we have people making double their working wage, from unemployment. Who the hell didn't see that as creating problems. One of my daughters is collecting over $900 a week on unemployment and her husband almost the same. In Tennessee that is an amazingly good wage, plus they aren't paying daycare. That is triple what a lot of people were making working 40 hours a week in dead end jobs. It is going to take an economic crowbar to get these folks back to work any sooner than they possibly can hold out for. It is going to be interesting to see the transition in the campaign as well. “Right now President Trump is running against everyone's idea of a perfect President, in October he will just be running against Joe Biden.” Susann Moy.

Well, let’s see. The Dow has been locked in a trading range the last 18 months or so. We’re in the late stage of the last economic cycle, so maybe the October Surprise will be a big fat recession. Trump has really been infuriating the Chinese with his trade war, so maybe the October Surprise is China sinking an US aircraft carrier in the Formosa Strait. Of course that might start a nuclear war. Surprise! Maybe Trump’s going to dump Melania and marry Stormy Daniels in a beautiful White House ceremony. Oh, the pageantry. Not impossible for a serial adulterer. If he remembers, maybe Trump will announce his Alzheimer’s diagnosis in October 2020, leaving the Republicans effectively without a candidate for president. Super surprise there. This is kind of a long shot, since he probably won’t be that far gone until 2021. Maybe a piece of border wall will fall on Trump during a dedication ceremony. Surprise to Trump too. Stupid low bidders. You can’t trust ‘em. The problem is that 100 meters of wall just isn’t stable by itself, and that’s all he will get built with funds stolen from other federal pockets. (Actually Trump’s gotten several miles of wall built, though it was scheduled to be built before he took office.) Maybe the October Surprise is something Democrats will never see coming, because it isn’t real. But it will be real to Trump’s base, the ones watching Fox News and reading Breitbart. He can tell whatever story he wants, and a fair number of people will never believe it isn’t true. So, 5,000 miles of wall built, all Democratic congressmen locked up, North Korea surrendering, The UK becoming the 51st state, and Christianity the State Religion. Talk about under-promising and over-delivering!

At this point there are a multitude of possibilities Probably first and foremost would be a spectacular economic report of growth, job creation, tax receipts brought in etc. This could also be in conjunction with some sort of breakthrough in one or more trade deals There is always the possibility that there could be a diplomatic breakthrough in one of the multitude of areas where US interests are involved, such a Russia, the DPRK, China, the Middle East…A recent breakthrough happened in Sudan which may have averted a civil war due to US diplomatic efforts and pressure, who knows what other things which are not being reported are happening below the surface? On the other side of the ledger, the collapse of the Collusion narrative has triggered an investigation by the Attorney General which promises to be deeply embarrassing to a wide array of Progressive politicians, bureaucrats and the Progressive media in general. The arrest of Jeffry Epstein and the unraveling of his circle of friends also promises to rip open a huge scandal including human trafficking, influence peddling and perhaps a host of other even less savoury things, If any of this has any connectivity to the Democrat candidate, they are sunk like the Titanic. Even the association of high ranking members or Party officials with Epstein is likely to have a severe negative influence. Unraveling the Imran Awan ring’s penetration of the DNC IT network and the shielding of their access to the network (despite repeated warnings) by then DNC chair Debbie Wasserman Schultz could have a very negative impact, in particular if it is tied to (even by comparison) to the 2014 hack of the White House by Russian hackers or the penetration of the OMB database by the Chinese uncovered in 2015. So the Democrats can wrestle with 1970 issues like school bussing, or making promises that are blatantly against the self interest of middle or working class Americans; positions which already alienate many Americans, meanwhile outside their bubble a veritable tsunami of potential October Surprises exist on the horizon.

I think the Republicans are getting somewhat desperate; they apparently are getting ready to release their “October Surprise” somewhat early— but it’s hardly much of one! See GOP set to release controversial Biden report “Republicans are preparing to release a report in a matter of days on their investigation focused on former Vice President Joe Biden and his son Hunter Biden, a move they hope will put fresh scrutiny on the Democratic nominee just weeks from the election. … “The GOP report, which is set to be released this week, is expected to argue that Hunter Biden's work impacted Obama-era Ukraine policy and created a conflict of interest given then-Vice President Joe Biden's work in the area. “No evidence has indicated criminal wrongdoing by the Bidens. A narrative, seized on by President Trump, that Biden worked to oust Ukrainian Prosecutor Viktor Shokin to protect his son has been widely discredited, though Hunter Biden has said joining the board was "poor judgement." … “The Wisconsin Republican's remarks talking up the report while blasting Biden's electoral prospects have poured fuel onto bipartisan concerns that Johnson is using his chairman's gavel to target Trump's political enemies. … “Sen. Mitt Romney (R-Utah), a member of Johnson's committee and the party's 2012 presidential nominee, warned that the Biden-Burisma probe was a "political exercise." "It's not the legitimate role of government for Congress, or for taxpayer expense to be used in an effort to damage political opponents," Romney said. … "Chairman Johnson has repeatedly claimed in the media that he has uncovered new and damaging information about Vice President Biden's activity in Ukraine," Wyden said. "This is simply not true. Nothing I have seen--not one bit of evidence--could lead to the conclusion that Vice President Biden did anything wrong in Ukraine."”

At this point with Trump turning various agencies into his own personal Gestapo, it might be an October surprise to learn that there will still be elections in November. If Trump is willing to take us this far down the road to Fascism to stay in office with the present Portland situation - you think he’ll allow elections if he has a say in the matter? People that say he has to allow elections don’t know enough history about how Fascism works. Trump has everything he needs in place to implement a semi-autocratic regime right now. He has his party dominating a chamber of Congress who will do nothing except standby and enable, acting as his loyalists. That isn’t full-blown single party state Fascism, but that is what we are leaning toward as things presently are. Trump is doing all the Fascism he can. Republicans are acting as his loyalty party. His Nazis. His enablers in Congress. They will do nothing to stop him it seems as he takes us down the road. They are just letting it happen.

Well. Trump has had a number of meetings and secret phone calls with Putin, over the last couple of years. Trump has never been forthcoming about what is discussed during these suspicious meetings, so we are completely justified to assume, that among the topics, that they have discussed, is how Putin can help Trump win re-election. We can also assume, that Trump has offered something in return (in a quid pro quo transaction). Trump got away with conspiring with Putin in 2016, because of destroyed communications (page 10, vol one of the Mueller report), because of uncooperative witnesses (Manafort, Roger Stone, Papadoulos), or because certain key witnesses were never interviewed by Mueller (including Trump Sr, Trump Jr., Kushner, Eric Trump, Ivanka Trump, etc.). Robert Mueller Didn’t Finish The Job, And We’ll Never Know Why Robert Mueller Obstructed His Own Investigation As Much as Donald Trump 11 looming questions now that Mueller’s investigation is over Mueller didn’t subpoena Trump’s financial records, in spite of Trump’s decades long dependence on financial support from Russian sources, to prevent financial ruin. Therefore, it is still an open question, whether Trump is a Russian asset. His position as president, makes it more difficult to uncover any conspiracy he may currently be involved in, with Putin. Perhaps the number one reason that Trump has stonewalled oversight investigations by the House, is because he fears that the committees, may uncover the damning evidence, that Mueller’s curiously narrow investigation, was unable to discover. We may never know for certain the extent of Putin’s control over Trump, unless intelligence agencies (ours, or that of our allies) are able to use surveillance, to monitor Trump’s communications. Another possibility, is that Putin may eventually seek to embarrass the US, by eventually releasing recordings of his interactions with Trump, when he no longer regards Trump as a useful idiot. It is supremely important, that steps should be taken to address Russian influence in the 2020 election, or the Russians may succeed in electing Trump again. We as citizens should be vigilant, and report any suspicious activity on social media, or any other signs of Foreign interference. For the time being, I will take advantage of quora’s international reach, and ask that intelligence agencies of our allies, if you are listening, could you please monitor Mr. Trump’s communications with tyrants like Putin? If you discover anything of concern, could you please share that information, with other allied intelligence agencies, and with the FBI?

I don’t think it will be a warrant for Biden’s arrest but it will be the announcement of a major investigation. Since Durham has already stated neither Biden or Obama are going to be indicted Barr: Obama, Biden not under criminal investigation despite Trump's claims It will likely involve the “evidence” Rudy brought back from the Ukraine and somehow even though we don’t even know who Biden’s VP pick will be, they will be involved. It will be completely made up, not supported by anything but crooked Bill Barr’s fantasies and the Cult will eat it up. Fox News will talk about it 24/7 from the announcement until the polls close two weeks later and then never again. You won’t be able to play the drinking game every time the words “deep State” are said. You’ll be drunk for two weeks.

During the last week of October, Trump, through Attorney General Barr, will announce that a plot by leftist groups has been discovered to blow up polling places in the cities of New York, Philadelphia, Chicago, San Francisco, Los Angeles - pretty much every city that has a Democratic Mayor and city government and a high percentage of registered Democratic Party voters. To protect these polling places from these unspecified leftist groups, Federal agents like those presently in Portland, Oregon will set up “protection cordons” around the poling places preventing people from voting “for their own protection”. With these registered Democrats prevented from voting “for their own protection”, Trump wins re-election.

If I tell you, it wouldn’t be a surprise. But I’ll take a wild guess and say Trump starts a major military action against Iran. Trump will talk about how he alone can defeat Iran in the conflict he’ll have created. Putin will like it because it will drive up world oil prices. Edited to add: I wrote the above before COVID got rolling in a big way. Now I’m guessing Trump will try something virus-related in October, like claiming he has a vaccine but will only share it if elected (like Nixon’s “secret plan” to end the war in Vietnam), or claiming that Biden opposed it, or something along those lines. Of course, an even bigger surprise that neither of them can control is if one or both of them drops dead of COVID, but I guess we’ll see.

Regardless of what it turns out to be it will likely not register nearly so much as in previous elections. The Trump Show is a never ending series of surprises, so many that we stopped naming them after the month and eventually stopped naming them altogether. There is no reason to think that’s going to change between now and November particularly in light of a pandemic, a lockdown, a restart, and an election coming on the heals of an impeachment, a military pullout, a trade war, the end of a treaty and a climate compact and a trade deal and….. It’s a series and there’s a new plot twist every week. November will be the season finale so I expect to see several good episodes leading up to a cliffhanger that gives us a preview of next season’s attractions. One final point, it’s the Trump Show and will remain that way. Nobody is willing to air the Biden Show.

Trump resigns and abandons the Republican ticket, leaving Pence and the remains of the GOP holding the bag. I think that would qualify as a surprise. Whether it will happen in October or a couple months before is something the tea leaves on my ouija board have yet to reveal. The discovery of whatever kompromat Putin has on Trump is a close second. You can be assured it’s something more significant that some low-budget celebrity sex tape. Trump’s the grab-‘em-by-the-pussy guy. He’s not afraid of that. This is something big.

Trump will announce that everyone suspected of having Covid-19 must be rounded up and put into camps to stop the spread of Covid-19. The Department of Justice will determine who is suspected of having Covid-19. These people suspected of having Covid-19 will all be registered Democrats. Of course the people in the camps will still be allowed to vote, and their ballot will be collected by the Department of Justice. This is a joke answer. I hope it is a joke answer.

If we knew, it wouldn’t be much of a surprise because people would be talking about it before October. I can think of one big surprise that is possible, though: a serious problem with either candidate’s health such that their ability to start or serve a full term becomes questionable. Both candidates are of an age where the probability of this happening is much higher than for others, Biden perhaps more so than Trump since he has already reached the US’ average male life expectancy and Trump still has a few more years to reach that point.

For what no one can understand he holds the October rally in Yorba LInda California in a huge carnival tent where he then announces that he was a deep libertarian mole to demonstrate how the election system and the conservative party has failed. In this dream world its the culmination of a a 40 year old vengeance conspiracy plot conceived by David Nolan and his inner circle for taking us off the Gold Standard. Then he will surprisingly spryly dash from the podium vault a wall and pee on Nixon’s grave while flashing Nixon’s famous Victory Sign wave.

Nadler will announce a new investigation into Trump meeting Satan in a place to be determined. He will figure this charge will the final nail in Trump’s coffin, and, because it is October, every media outlet will believe the charge. Hillary will be quite orgasmic.

That certainly can only be theorized now - it’s still too far away, and too much unknown - however I can’t foresee that there won’t be much more cheating - how much and where depends on what the numbers look like then! Also there’s no guarantee despite Trump’s crooked enablers jumping through hoops to get him to the finish will succeed - Covid or FTD could cause a change of plans - it would be absolutely fascinating if every day didn’t suck as bad as it did!
Hillary Clinton will produce pictures from her server showing Donald Trump naked in bed with Vladimir Putin and Elizabeth Warren will claim to have proof that she is Hiawatha’s granddaughter.

A war. America does not change horses in mid-stream. Syria is protected by Putin, so the victim may be Iran or Venezuela. When Putin spoke to TRump in Vietnam (11/11/17) he advised the Orange Clown that only needed 34 Senators to keep his job (impeachment). He referred to Recep T Erdogan taking his advice about elections. Neither DJ Trump nor Vladimir Putin will lose any sleep over innocent lives. And Putin still needs the Donald to drop sanctions (on everyone, not just Oleg Deripaska).

Just happened 10/2: trump with c19. Footnote to history:. The republicans may try a last-minute dust storm claiming democrats wrongly accused trump in impeachment OR SOMETHING like that, but it will rapidly be seen as a big empty bag full of hot air & cost republicans their last thimble-full of credibility.

By definition a surprise is a surprise. In 1968 Lyndon Johnson released what was called the October Surprise to try to help his Vice President win. It was an immediate halt to all bombing in North Vietnam to move the Paris Peace Negotiations along. For a Good Laugh ~ Google>>> Etsy Trump Three Dollar Bills

If it appears to be a Democrat landslide president Trump will pretend illness (debilitating bone spurs) and abdicate his throne in favor of the more electable Veep Pence. After receiving a federal pardon Trump will slither off to a non extradition country to avoid state charges.
DNC replaces the properly selected Democrat candidates with Hillary Clinton / Michelle Obama. In response, Democrats refuse to go to the polls and Trump is re-elected, carrying all 50 states.

Russia is a hoax. Surprise! The Democrats have already started “The Hunt for (a) “Red” October. It’s definitely the Russians giving Trump their complete assistance in winning the election. Trump must be smarter than the Democrats. Twice now he has gotten Boris and Natasha over here to rig the voting machines!

Diane Fienstein has a letter from Elizabeth Warren that Donald Trump fondled her in an elevator when they they weren't in school together as witnessed by Adam Schiff and Michael Avenatti is suing on her behalf.
We already live in a reality where DONALD TRUMP is President of the United States so it’s impossible to imagine an “October Surprise.”

Breaking out concealed surprises very late in the national campaign is a frequent democrat trick, NOT a republican one. Your question is false. Also a totalitarian-democrat-socialist typical mechanism.

Since Trump has allowed Putin to place a bounty on our troops for over a year, I suspect the October surprise might have something to do with lead poisoning. The troops who were killed have family and comrades in arms who just might be more than a little put out.

Tough question. My guess is that it may be something related to 1) mail-in and absentee voting; or, 2) a deplorable instance of Trump’s abuse of presidential power will stop the entire congress in its’ tracks.

You mean like James Comey announcing an investigation of the Democratic candidate a week and a half before the election? And then announcing, on the very eve of the election, that it was all a mistake? I do not know what they will try this time out.
It will probably have something disgusting to do with Trump. At this point we should not be “surprised” by anything that Trump does. The man is a lunatic.
Joe Biden will come out swinging Trump will go down. He will blame fake news!
It may be before October, but the Durham investigation will result in indictments of a number of Obama administration individuals.
Michael does it really matter? Nothing much changes for you and I. Michael I wrote a long answer but Quora did not approve.
Joe Biden will name Tara Reade as his pick for Vice President.
I’m betting that trump and many other Republicans will get coronavirus infections
An announcement by the DOJ that charges have been filed against whomever the Democratic candidate is..
Trump will, on national TV, fall on the floor in pain and bursting out of his stomach area we will see Joe McCarthy.
I wonder if Trump has started work on the October surprise. Have Democratic cities in such an uproar in these cities that voting is limited.
Probably another EIP much larger than the first one paid out around the end of October just in time for people to remember it on election day.
The election will take place in November, not October, and it will not be a surprise since the candidates will be well known.
